full_description:
Huntkey CP3000 300W Power Supply

The Huntkey CP3000 300W Power Supply is a reliable and efficient component designed to meet the demands of modern computing systems. With its sleek design and advanced features, it provides stable power output for a variety of devices, ensuring smooth operation and longevity. This power supply unit (PSU) offers ample power for standard computing tasks and moderate graphics processing, complying with the ATX12V 2.31 standard for compatibility with a wide range of systems and components. Equipped with a 12cm silent fan, it effectively dissipates heat while minimizing noise levels, and maintaining optimal operating temperatures. Designed for high efficiency and reliability, it delivers stable power to your system while minimizing energy waste. Its wide input voltage range of 180-264V~ allows it to adapt to various electrical environments, providing consistent performance. Compatible with both Intel and AMD platforms, including support for core graphics processing, it offers versatility for diverse computer builds. Additionally, it features multiple protections such as Over Voltage Protection (OVP), Short Circuit Protection (SCP), and Power Protection (OPP), safeguarding components from potential damage. Each unit undergoes rigorous testing, including a 100% hi-pot test and a 100% burn-in test, ensuring reliability and performance under demanding conditions. With connectors including a 4-pin CPU connector and multiple hard disk interfaces (2 SATA, 2 HDD), it provides ample connectivity for powering and connecting various components and storage devices.

full_description:
Huntkey CP5000 500W Power Supply

The Huntkey CP5000 500W Power Supply is a robust and efficient component engineered to meet the demanding power requirements of modern computer systems. With a keen focus on performance, stability, and safety, this power supply unit (PSU) offers a comprehensive array of features to support high-performance computing. Its Active Power Factor Correction (A-PFC) technology ensures efficient power usage and compatibility across a wide range of input voltages, ranging from 180V to 264V AC. Utilizing a Two-transistor Forward topology, the CP5000 achieves efficient power conversion with minimal energy loss. It adheres to Intel ATX12V V2.31 standards, ensuring seamless compatibility and reliability for contemporary computer setups. Equipped with a 12cm fan, this PSU operates with super low noise levels, delivering a quieter computing experience without compromising on cooling efficiency. It's designed to support both Intel and AMD multi-core CPUs, providing stable and consistent power delivery for high-performance computing tasks. With multiple protections including Over Voltage Protection (OVP), Short Circuit Protection (SCP), and Over Power Protection (OPP), the CP5000 ensures the safety of connected components. It offers versatile connectivity options such as a 4+4 pin CPU connector for modern processors, a (6+2-6+2) pin PCI connector for graphics cards, and multiple hard disk interfaces including 4 SATA and 2 HDD connectors, accommodating various storage configurations. The Huntkey CP5000 500W Power Supply is an excellent choice for users seeking a reliable, efficient, and feature-rich power solution for their computing needs, be it gaming, content creation, or general computing tasks.

full_description:
Huntkey CP6000 600W Power Supply

The Huntkey CP6000 600W Power Supply is a reliable and efficient solution designed to meet the power demands of modern computing systems. With an output capacity of 600 watts, it provides ample power for various components within your system. This power supply unit (PSU) complies with Intel ATX12V V2.31 standards, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of systems. Equipped with a 12cm silent fan, the CP6000 offers effective cooling while maintaining a quiet operation, ensuring optimal performance and longevity of your hardware. Its high efficiency and reliability make it suitable for both home and professional use. With a voltage input range of 180-264Vac and Active Power Factor Correction (A-PFC), this PSU effectively controls power supply, reducing energy waste and guaranteeing steady performance. The CP6000's efficiency and reliability are further enhanced by its Two-transistor Forward design, which is part of its topological structure. This power supply unit is adaptable to different system setups since it supports multi-core CPUs from AMD and Intel. It also has several safeguards, such as Over Voltage Protection (OVP), Short Circuit Protection (SCP), and Over Power Protection (OPP), which shield your components from possible harm from electrical problems. The CP6000 comes with all the connections you need to integrate it easily into your system. It has a PCI connection (6+2-pin) for graphics card power and a 4+4-pin CPU connector for CPU power supply. It also has four SATA and two HDD ports, so storage devices have plenty of connecting possibilities. The Huntkey CP6000 600W Power Supply is a great option for powering your desktop computer or workstation since it combines performance, efficiency, and dependability.

full_description:
Huntkey GS800 Prime 700W 80+ Bronze Power Supply

The Huntkey GS800 Prime 700W 80+ Bronze Power Supply provides a high-efficiency power solution for demanding PC systems. It is dependable and energy-efficient for both professionals and gamers, with an efficiency rating of 80 Plus Bronze and a strong 700W output capacity. A 12cm hydraulic bearing fan is integrated to guarantee effective cooling and silent operation. At normal loads, the 80 PLUS BRONZE-certified GS800 Prime achieves energy efficiency levels above 90%. Because of its higher efficiency, the components last longer and need less energy because less heat is produced. It has a sturdy +12V single rail that can supply up to 55A (660W), which is ideal for powering graphics cards and high-end CPUs. Your premium components will receive steady, dependable power for optimal performance thanks to the strong supply. The GS800 Prime has very accurate voltage regulation; for ordinary loads, the output accuracy of the +5V and +3.3V rails is well regulated under 3% and less than 1%. This accuracy offers sensitive components a more consistent and dependable power supply since it is far better than the industry norm of 5%. By keeping the power supply operating cool and silent even under severe loads, the integrated 12CM hydraulic bearing fan guarantees effective cooling with low noise, improving both the operational efficiency and user experience.
